sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy condemned Russia for the missile strikes, saying it proves Moscow deserves defeat and a tribunal to be judged.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the Russian Defense Ministry announced its troops successfully repelled seven attacks by Kyiv's forces in the Donetsk direction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Speaking from his cell via social media, Navalny's comments are his first since the aborted Wagner mutiny.

It wasn't the ACF that brought Russia to the brink of civil war. It was Putin personally who did this. I remind you that he personally pardoned all those convicts who were on their way to assassinate Shoigu and whoever else they wanted to kill.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13

sentences.sentence: Lukashenko also says he's offered members of the Wagner Group who've left Russia an abandoned military base in the country. But he also stressed they would not be used to guard the nuclear weapons Moscow has just been delivered.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: But having the Wagner mercenary group installed in Belarus is causing alarm in Poland and in the West generally. Washington says it will take measures against the Wagner Group, which is also active in Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: France's President Emmanuel Macron will host NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg here in Paris this Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A meeting that, according to the Élysée Palace, had been set up prior to the dramatic events we saw unfold in Russia over the weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A meeting that was originally designed to prepare for the NATO summit in Vilnius in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: to prepare for the NATO summit in Vilnius in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But of course, a meeting that will be dominated by that failed Wagner rebellion in Russia and what that means for the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Emmanuel Macron, who has reportedly followed the developments in Russia hour by hour throughout the weekend, he was in constant communication with his American, German and British counterparts and has come forward to say that what happened in Russia unveils the cracks, the divisions within Russia's camp, as well as the fragility of Vladimir Putin's army, as well as those auxiliary forces such as the Wagner Group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It's going to be interesting to see just what comes out of that meeting. Concretely, both men agree on the necessity to continue to support Ukraine in its counter offensive and will most likely develop new ways for that partnership to continue to be strong and unanimous across the alliance. Emmanuel Macron is also reportedly going to push for the rapid ratification of Sweden's membership following that of Finland's.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.sentence: A fresco featuring various food items, including what appears to be a pizza, has been discovered by excavators in the ancient Italian city of Pompeii.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The key ingredients associated with pizza, namely tomatoes and mozzarella, do not feature in the fresco painting, but archaeologists say that those ingredients did not exist some 2,000 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Instead, what's believed to be a focaccia bread is topped with fruits and spices, or a type of pesto.
